testcase.name: To make a payment with valid Payment details
testcase.system-out: Given User is in BDD Demo Login Page http://localhost:60854/Account/Login...passed And User enters username in BDD Demo Promantus..............................passed And user enters password in BDD Demo bdd...................................passed And user clicks on Login button.............................................passed And user is redirected to paybill page......................................passed And user enters dayofpayment................................................passed And user enters amount......................................................passed And user enters SwiftCode...................................................passed When user clicks on make payment............................................passed And user is redirected to otp page..........................................passed And user enters the otp.....................................................passed And user clicks on submit otp...............................................passed Then user should see the payment successful page............................passed
